overview: SHOT ENTIRELY DURING THE 2022 ACADEMY AWARDS. After waking up in a room with no exit, an unsatisfied content creator is forced to confront his insecurities in the form of characters he's played throughout his life.
tagline: After waking up in a room with no exit, an unsatisfied content creator is forced to confront his insecurities in the form of characters he's played throughout his life.
title: Discontent
